title: iPhone 16/16 Pro Review: Times Have Changed!
description: iPhone 16 is here. Job finished? Job ain't finished.  Find a new wallpaper with the Panels app!   MKBHD Merch:   Tech I'm using right now:   Intro Track:  Playlist of MKBHD Intro music:   Phone provided by Apple for review.  ~     0:00 Intro/Panels!! 2:52 What's Actually New 7:15 Camera Control 11:14 New Cameras 14:24 Barely Reviewable 18:35 So... Buy It?
